definition: Iteratively improving search queries based on results, narrowing or broadening scope to better match the information need

positive_examples: Search refinement added date filters after the initial results included outdated sources.
Refining the search, the user added exclusion terms to filter out irrelevant meanings.
Search refinement used relevant results to discover additional keywords for expansion.
The refinement narrowed from 10,000 results to 50 highly relevant papers.
training_hints.disambiguation: Strategic query improvement based on result analysis
